ancestors.content:
First big #Rain of the #Monsoon in #Lahore floods the city, 44-yr record broken

A foot of rain fell in just 3 hours early in the morning, houses, hospitals flooded

My own family home, despite being raised from the street, is under half a foot of water. This has NEVER happened before.

And theres nothing we can do for now...

Will update the thread as more media reports online.

https://tribune.com.pk/story/2484655/monsoon-rains-break-44-year-record-in-lahore

#ClimateCrisis #ClimateChange #ClimateDiary #Pakistan #SouthAsia #Punjab #Flood #UrbanFlood

card.title: Monsoon rains break 44 year record in Lahore
card.description: Record breaking rainfall in provincial capital led to widespread flooding and power outages

ancestors.content:
#Lahore was submerged while the provinces of #Punjab and #KP were deluged by #Monsoon #rains

356mm or a foot and a half of rain fell in THREE HOURS across the city.

45 people died and 132 injured across the province alone.

https://www.dawn.com/news/1849532

#ClimateChange #ClimateCrisis #ClimateDeaths #SouthAsia #Flood #Flooding #Pakistan #Peshawer #Paktodon #GlobalSouth

card.title: Lahore submerged as rain breaks 44-year record
card.description: Two killed in Chitral and Abbottabad; Met official predicts above-normal rainfall until Aug 15 in two spells.

ancestors.content:
Article sharing how torrential #rain affects a metropolitan city like #Lahore, home to over 11 million people (a third more than #London).

tl;dr: #Sinkholes #VehicularDamage #TransportParalysis #WaterOutage #ElectricityOutage , which translates to no safe food, toilets, rest. Even in "clean, nice" neighbourhoods this leads to spread of infections and misery while the flood lasts.

https://www.dawn.com/news/1849475/rain-creates-sinkholes-in-johar-town

#ClimateChange #ClimateDiary #ClimateCrisis #Pakistan #GlobalSouth #Paktodon #SouthAsia

card.title: Rain creates sinkholes in Johar Town
card.description: Wasa, Lesco tested till breaking point

ancestors.content:
Coming now to the second province in #Pakistan affected by the rains. Uptil 1st Aug 2024, 24 people had died and hundreds of families made homeless by the rains.

"Pakistan usually receives 255mm of rain each month", #Lahore received 356mm in THREE HOURS. Don't have data on rain in #KP though.

Its times like these I miss the old civic space that was #twitter.

https://www.dawn.com/news/1849394/24-dead-in-rain-related-incidents-across-khyber-pakhtunkhwa-disaster-management

#ClimateChange #Monsoon #ClimateCrisis #ClimateDiary #Peshawer #SouthAsia #GlobalSouth #Paktodon

card.title: 24 dead in rain-related incidents across Khyber Pakhtunkhwa: disaster management
card.description: More than 100 houses destroyed since July 29 as flash floods sweep through Upper Chitral, PDMA says.

descendants.content:
I often remark to friends about #Pakistan 's mountainous north being unsuitable for life now thanks to #ClimateChange induced melting, flooding, and landslides.

The #Karakorum #Highway the world's highest such motorway connecting Pak to #China should be thought of a "seasonal" road now, gets washed away on an annual basis, sometimes more frequently.

We cannot afford to rebuild every year!

https://www.dawn.com/news/1853216/karakoram-highway-blocked-as-floods-ravage-gb

#ClimateCrisis #ClimateDiary #Heatwave #GLOF #SouthAsia #FlashFlood #Gilgit

card.title: Karakoram Highway blocked as floods ravage GB
card.description: In Gilgit’s Jaglot and Hunza’s Shishkat village, the highway has been blocked due to mudflow.
